talk.author: did:plc:76h7vzrxiwiplzntk4jeyjc7
talk.utter: Can you fix the number shortcuts to jump between columns in the deck? It appears only numbers 4 to 9 work but i would like to have something similar to the one that tweetdeck had.

talk.author: did:plc:4tr5dqti7nmu6g2czpthntak
talk.utter:
If it is not scrollable, it will not be scrolled. The last column can only be moved to the right edge of the screen.
This may be a different behavior than TweetDeck (I don't have access to it because I don't pay for it lol)

talk.author: did:plc:76h7vzrxiwiplzntk4jeyjc7
talk.utter: i dont mean scrollable. Currently when i type 4 it jumps to the second column. Typing 1 jumps to the first columns and 9 to the sixth column. On tweetdeck we could use 0-9 to move between columns
